openwebui_variables.name: AZURE_STORAGE_CONTAINER_NAME
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the container name for Azure Storage.

openwebui_variables.name: AZURE_STORAGE_ENDPOINT
openwebui_variables.description: Sets the endpoint URL for Azure Storage.

openwebui_variables.name: AZURE_STORAGE_KEY
openwebui_variables.description:
Set the access key for Azure Storage.
  - Optional - if not provided, credentials will be taken from the environment. User credentials if run locally and Managed Identity if run in Azure services.

### OpenTelemetry Configuration
